overview:
Michael is an entrepreneur and former corporate attorney in New York. He is the founder and CEO of LibraryMixer, a website where friends can build a social library of media together. With help from the open source community, he built a compatible app called the Mixologist that helps friends on LibraryMixer communicate.

Michael studied computer programming as an undergraduate in University of California at Berkeley, and he holds a J.D. from Columbia Law School in New York.
